channel.title: ::pickup = connection loss? help!?
channel.description: ok on my serevr every time i try to do ::pickup it logss me out and in everytime help plz

item.title: ::pickup = connection loss? help!?
item.dc:creator: @Jellybean732 Jellybean732
item.description:
@Jellybean732 wrote:

If youâ€™re trying to pickup an item > 10000 then you need to use the pick command and also go into item.java and change
public static boolean[] itemStackable = new boolean[10000];
public static boolean[] itemIsNote = new boolean[10000];
public static boolean[] itemTwoHanded = new boolean[10000];
public static boolean[] itemTradeable = new boolean[10000];
public static boolean[] itemSellable = new boolean[10000];

to

public static boolean[] itemStackable = new boolean[20000];
public static boolean[] itemIsNote = new boolean[20000];
public static boolean[] itemTwoHanded = new boolean[20000];
public static boolean[] itemTradeable = new boolean[20000];
public static boolean[] itemSellable = new boolean[20000];

Read full topic
